name: 프로젝트 오버킬
summary: OVERKILL, a PC-based 3D side-scrolling action RPG Virtual World is being built on Unreal Engine 4 by NEOPLE INC., a consolidated subsidiary of Nexon. More information on the release schedule and regional availability of OVERKILL will be announced at a later date.
info:
• 开发: Neople
  • 发行: NEXON
  • 别名: Project Overkill
  • 别名: OVERKILL
  • 别名: Dungeon & Fighter: OVERKILL
  • 别名: DNF: OVERKILL
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: ARPG
  • 游戏引擎: Unreal Engine 4
  • 发行日期: 未定
  • 官方网站: https://dnf-overkill.com/teaser.html
